contacts.name: Fu Xuan
contacts.signature: I do not divine personal fortunes!

200880000.text: Say, have you heard of a knowledge-sharing website named Knowfinity?

200880001.text: The myriad of topics on this website encompass a diverse range, leaving no stone unturned. Occasionally, I, too, receive invitations to answer some of the questions posted there.

200880002.text: Look at this one: <u>How can a leader maximize their direct report's motivation to work</u>.

200880003.text: Why exactly do they want to invite me to answer this question...?

200880004.text: You are an outstanding leader... Of course, as the master diviner managing the Divination Commission, a workplace question like this is a piece of cake for you

200880005.text: As the master diviner, you are highly experienced in the workplace, and the other diviners rally around you in unity.

200880008.text: "To govern is to harmonize — higher-ups and underlings must not encroach."

200880009.text: "Let those keen of sight be on the lookout, and let those sharp of claws to go on the hunt. Let all use their greatest strength, then all shall attain peace."

200880010.text: The most important aspect of the workplace is to ensure everyone is employed to do what they do best, and do not intrude upon each other's jobs.

200880011.text: "How can a leader maximize their direct report's motivation to work" is, in fact, all about "letting the right person do the right job."

200880012.text: This answer is very good as it is. You can probably just copy paste what you just wrote, I think

200880013.text: Sounds like you already have your own answer, and I didn't manage to help at all

200880014.text: I still need to think about this. Since they specifically invited me, they must also want examples from my own circumstances.

200880015.text: Can you make diviner Qingque the example?

200880016.text: Qingque? She tries her absolute best at being a lazy slacker. Though I have my ways to deal with her...

200880017.text: ...I fear she is truly lazy to the bone. In fact, she is making me want to post on Knowfinity, "How can one motivate a habitual slacker to do work"... No, this example won't do.

200880018.text: Hmm... Let me ponder this a bit more...

200880019.text: You are an outstanding subordinate... Of course, as General Jing Yuan's support staff, a workplace question like this is a piece of cake for you

200880020.text: As the master diviner, you are highly experienced in the workplace, and your teamwork with the General of Divine Foresight is flawless in its unity.

200880022.text: ...I did not expect you to take this approach.

200880023.text: "To govern is to harmonize — higher-ups and underlings must not encroach."

200880024.text: "Let those keen of sight be on the lookout, and let those sharp of claws to go on the hunt. Let all use their greatest strength, then all shall attain peace."

200880025.text: The general is very perceptive of people, and knows who to use for what task... working with him is indeed a delightful experience. I am not the only one who thinks that about him. I am sure Madam Yukong shares these sentiments.

200880026.text: "How can a leader maximize their direct report's motivation to work" is, in fact, all about "letting the right person do the right job."

200880027.text: This answer is very good as it is. You can probably just copy paste what you just wrote, I think

200880028.text: Sounds like you already have your own answer, and I didn't manage to help at all

200880029.text: I still need to think about this. Since they specifically invited me, they must also want examples from my own circumstances.

200880030.text: Can you make General Jing Yuan the example?

200880031.text: Though I have been working with him for many years, Jing Yuan keeps doing this to make me strategize for him... No, this example won't do.

200880032.text: He had merely stirred my motivation in the short term. In the long term... I will not fall for his tricks again.

200880033.text: Hmm... Let me ponder this a bit more...
